sentences.english: In the distant ancient Greece, there was a beautiful legend.
sentences.chinese: 在遥远的希腊古国，有一个美丽动人的传说。

sentences.english: The ancestors of the Tibetan race built up Gouding old kingdom from the Spring and Autumn Era to the Han and Jin dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 自春秋至汉晋时代，壮族先民创建了句町古国。

sentences.english: The ancient Chinese civilization has been revitalized.
sentences.chinese: 文明古国迸发出前所未有的青春活力。

sentences.english: Wulie King of Shangbao in Ming Dynasty, Li Tianbao, had issued the decree to prescribe the Qingqianliu as the national tea.
sentences.chinese: 明代上堡古国武烈王李天保曾下圣旨将其定为国茶。

sentences.english: The Nadam Festival is a traditional occasion for Mongols to get together for a few days of festivity .
sentences.chinese: 传统地，蒙古国人民在那达慕节要聚集欢宴几天。

sentences.english: It was in ancient Loulan a strange bird.
sentences.chinese: 那是在楼兰古国的一种奇特的鸟。

sentences.english: China is carrying the world ancient civilizations, is the home of the wine.
sentences.chinese: 中国是卓立世界的文明古国，是酒的故乡。

sentences.english: The ancient civilization became a byword for isolation and stagnation.
sentences.chinese: 闭关锁国，停滞不前成了这个文明古国的代名词。

sentences.english: China is a country with a time-honored civilization and a land of ceremony and decorum.
sentences.chinese: 中国是文明古国，礼仪之邦，很重礼节。

sentences.english: Today, the history enables the two countries with ancient civilizations to join hands for greater prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 如今，历史再次让两个文明古国联袂牵手，再创辉煌。

sentences.english: An ancient country of Palestine between the Dead Sea and the Gulf of Aqaba .
sentences.chinese: 巴勒斯坦的一个古国，位于死海与亚喀巴湾之间。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, China is a country with ancient civilization and a land of courtesy.
sentences.chinese: 同时，中国欧式文明古国，礼仪之邦。

sentences.english: India and China are both ancient civilisations.
sentences.chinese: 印度和中国都是文明古国。

sentences.english: Egypt is an ancient country which has long history and culture. The 3200 B.
sentences.chinese: 埃及是个具有悠久历史和文化的古国。

sentences.english: Following the fall of the Soviet Union, Mongolia adopted electoral politics.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古国在苏联解体后实施选举政治制度。

sentences.english: China is an ancient civilization and has made remarkable contributions to human development.
sentences.chinese: 中国是世界文明古国，为人类发展作出过杰出的贡献。

definition: sun worship/Zoroastrianism/see also 祆教[Xian1 jiao4]
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
(lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
